languages.text: "Тонкое наблюдение, госпожа Хейдари. Отметьте особый окрас кожных покровов "ксеноса". Конечно, можно допустить, что это противоестественная мимикрия под окружение, но я все же ставлю на результат отравления. Юноша, если вы не хотите, чтобы ваш бесценный ксеноэкспонат отдал концы прямо на цепи — найдите медикуса, и побыстрее".

"A keen observation, Mistress Heydari. Note the unusual colouration of this xenos's skin. Of course, one might suppose that this is some unnatural mimicry that's helping it blend in with its surroundings, but I would still bet on it being the result of poisoning. Young man, if you don't want your precious xeno-exhibit to expire right here on this chain, I suggest you find a chirurgeon, quickly."
languages.original_text: "Тонкое наблюдение, госпожа Хейдари. Отметьте особый окрас кожных покровов "ксеноса". languages.text: 「素晴らしい洞察力だ、ヘイダリ嬢。この異種族の皮膚の色は異常だ。周囲に溶け込むための不自然な擬態である可能性も捨てきれないが、我は毒の影響だと思います。青年、この鎖につながれた大事な異種族の展示物をこのまま死なせたくないなら、急いでチラージョンを見つけることをすすめるよ」
languages.original_text: "A keen observation, Mistress Heydari. Note the unusual colouration of this xenos's skin. Of course, one might suppose that this is some unnatural mimicry that's helping it blend in with its surroundings, but I would still bet on it being the result of poisoning. Young man, if you don't want your precious xeno-exhibit to expire right here on this chain, I suggest you find a chirurgeon, quickly."

traits.locale_text: 「素晴らしい洞察力だ、ヘイダリ嬢。この異種族の皮膚の色は異常だ。周囲に溶け込むための不自然な擬態である可能性も捨てきれないが、我は毒の影響だと思います。青年、この鎖につながれた大事な異種族の展示物をこのまま死なせたくないなら、急いでチラージョンを見つけることをすすめるよ」

languages.text: “真是敏锐的观察，海达利女士。不过，请留意一下这只异形不同寻常的肤色。当然了，有人可能会认为这是某种古怪的拟态，用来帮助它融入周围的环境之中，但我坚持认为这就是中毒导致的结果。年轻人，如果你不想让你这珍贵的异形展品很快死在这条链子上，我建议你去找个外科医生，动作快点。”
languages.original_text: "A keen observation, Mistress Heydari. Note the unusual colouration of this xenos's skin. Of course, one might suppose that this is some unnatural mimicry that's helping it blend in with its surroundings, but I would still bet on it being the result of poisoning. Young man, if you don't want your precious xeno-exhibit to expire right here on this chain, I suggest you find a chirurgeon, quickly."

traits.locale_text: “真是敏锐的观察，海达利女士。不过，请留意一下这只异形不同寻常的肤色。当然了，有人可能会认为这是某种古怪的拟态，用来帮助它融入周围的环境之中，但我坚持认为这就是中毒导致的结果。年轻人，如果你不想让你这珍贵的异形展品很快死在这条链子上，我建议你去找个外科医生，动作快点。”

languages.text: «Buena observación, señora Heydari. Fíjese en esa coloración tan poco habitual que tiene este xenos. Podría suponerse que se trata de un mimetismo antinatural que lo ayuda a mimetizarse con su entorno, pero yo me aventuraría a decir que es el resultado de un envenenamiento. Joven, si no quiere que su precioso xenoejemplar muera en esta cadena, le sugiero que busque un cirujano, rápido».
languages.original_text: "A keen observation, Mistress Heydari. Note the unusual colouration of this xenos's skin. Of course, one might suppose that this is some unnatural mimicry that's helping it blend in with its surroundings, but I would still bet on it being the result of poisoning. Young man, if you don't want your precious xeno-exhibit to expire right here on this chain, I suggest you find a chirurgeon, quickly."

traits.locale_text: «Buena observación, señora Heydari. Fíjese en esa coloración tan poco habitual que tiene este xenos. Podría suponerse que se trata de un mimetismo antinatural que lo ayuda a mimetizarse con su entorno, pero yo me aventuraría a decir que es el resultado de un envenenamiento. Joven, si no quiere que su precioso xenoejemplar muera en esta cadena, le sugiero que busque un cirujano, rápido».

languages.text: « Bien observé, dame Heydari. Remarquez la coloration inhabituelle de la peau de ce xénos. Bien sûr, on pourrait supposer qu'il s'agit là d'un étonnant mécanisme de camouflage dans l'environnement, mais je penche plutôt en faveur d'un empoisonnement. Jeune homme, si vous voulez que votre précieuse créature continue d'attirer le chaland, je vous conseille de trouver un chirurgeon de toute urgence. »
languages.original_text: "A keen observation, Mistress Heydari. Note the unusual colouration of this xenos's skin. Of course, one might suppose that this is some unnatural mimicry that's helping it blend in with its surroundings, but I would still bet on it being the result of poisoning. Young man, if you don't want your precious xeno-exhibit to expire right here on this chain, I suggest you find a chirurgeon, quickly."

traits.locale_text: « Bien observé, dame Heydari. Remarquez la coloration inhabituelle de la peau de ce xénos. Bien sûr, on pourrait supposer qu'il s'agit là d'un étonnant mécanisme de camouflage dans l'environnement, mais je penche plutôt en faveur d'un empoisonnement. Jeune homme, si vous voulez que votre précieuse créature continue d'attirer le chaland, je vous conseille de trouver un chirurgeon de toute urgence. »

languages.text: "Eine scharfsichtige Beobachtung, Herrin Heydari. Man beachte die ungewöhnliche Hautfärbung dieses Xenos. Die Vermutung liegt nahe, dass es sich um ein ungewöhnliches Mimikry handelt, um besser mit seiner Umgebung zu verschmelzen, aber ich würde dennoch auf eine Vergiftung wetten. Junger Mann, falls Euer wertvolles Xeno-Exponat nicht gleich hier an dieser Kette verenden soll, schlage ich vor, Ihr beschafft rasch einen Chirurgeum."
languages.original_text: "A keen observation, Mistress Heydari. Note the unusual colouration of this xenos's skin. Of course, one might suppose that this is some unnatural mimicry that's helping it blend in with its surroundings, but I would still bet on it being the result of poisoning. Young man, if you don't want your precious xeno-exhibit to expire right here on this chain, I suggest you find a chirurgeon, quickly."

traits.locale_text: "Eine scharfsichtige Beobachtung, Herrin Heydari. Man beachte die ungewöhnliche Hautfärbung dieses Xenos. Die Vermutung liegt nahe, dass es sich um ein ungewöhnliches Mimikry handelt, um besser mit seiner Umgebung zu verschmelzen, aber ich würde dennoch auf eine Vergiftung wetten. Junger Mann, falls Euer wertvolles Xeno-Exponat nicht gleich hier an dieser Kette verenden soll, schlage ich vor, Ihr beschafft rasch einen Chirurgeum."

languages.text: "İyi bir gözlem Üstat Heydari. Şu zenonun tenindeki olağan dışı renklere bakın. Elbette bunun, çevresine uyum sağlamasına yardımcı olan alışılmışın dışında bir taklit çabası olduğu da söylenebilir. Yine de kanımca bu durum bir tür zehirden kaynaklı. Genç adam, zeno serginin vakitsiz bitmesini istemiyorsan bir cerrah bulmanı öneririm. Hem de acilen."
languages.original_text: "A keen observation, Mistress Heydari. Note the unusual colouration of this xenos's skin. Of course, one might suppose that this is some unnatural mimicry that's helping it blend in with its surroundings, but I would still bet on it being the result of poisoning. Young man, if you don't want your precious xeno-exhibit to expire right here on this chain, I suggest you find a chirurgeon, quickly."

traits.locale_text: "İyi bir gözlem Üstat Heydari. Bu zenonun tenindeki olağan dışı renklere bakın. Elbette bunun, çevresine uyum sağlamasına yardımcı olan, alışılmışın dışında bir taklit çabası olduğu da söylenebilir ama ben yine de iddiaya girerim ki bu bir tür zehirden kaynaklı. Genç adam, eğer bunun, o çok değerli zeno sergilerinin sonuncusu olmasını istemiyorsan bir cerrah bulup getirmeni öneririm. Hem de derhâl."
